label: Mobile Payments
description: Payment methods that allow users to pay for goods and services using their mobile devices.
intents: Pay for goods and services using phone credit

subcategories.label: Pay by Phone Bill
subcategories.description: Payment method that allows users to pay for goods and services using their mobile phone bill.

subcategories.label: Mobile Wallets
subcategories.description: Payment method that allows users to store payment information on their mobile devices.

subcategories.label: Direct Debit
subcategories.description: Payment method that allows users to authorize automatic payments from their bank accounts.

subcategories.label: Online Payments
subcategories.description: Payment methods that allow users to make payments online.

subcategories.label: Pay by SMS
subcategories.description: Payment method that allows users to pay for goods and services using SMS messages.
